name: Dell Networking Switches running Enterprise SONiC OS日志信息泄露漏洞
product: ["Dell Networking Switches running Enterprise SONiC OS <4.4.1", "Dell Networking Switches running Enterprise SONiC OS <4.2.3"]
description: Dell Networking Switches running Enterprise SONiC OS是戴尔推出的基于开源的网络操作系统，专为数据中心和云计算场景设计，支持从边缘到核心再到云的统一网络架构。Dell Networking Switches running Enterprise SONiC OS存在日志信息泄露漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致信息泄露。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://www.dell.com/support/kbdoc/en-us/000278568/dsa-2025-057-security-update-for-dell-enterprise-sonic-distribution-vulnerability
patch: Dell Networking Switches running Enterprise SONiC OS日志信息泄露漏洞的补丁
